meanings.definition: A person who is in the same class as another student.
meanings.sent1: My classmate and I work on projects together.
meanings.sent2: I have a new classmate in my math class.
meanings.sent3: My classmate always brings the funniest jokes to school.
meanings.sent4: She is like a ray of sunshine in our class, my classmate.
meanings.sent5: During recess, my classmate and I play tag together.

meanings.definition: A member of the same class or group.
meanings.sent1: My dance classmate is very talented.
meanings.sent2: He is my classmate in the chess club.
meanings.sent3: My classmate in the cooking class makes the best cookies.
meanings.sent4: She is a true gem, my classmate in the book club.
meanings.sent5: In the art group, my classmate always inspires me with her creativity.
